We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private T3MovingAverage _t3;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_t3 = T3(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_t3.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "T3 Current", _t3.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.t3 = self.T3(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.t3.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "T3 Current", self.t3.Current);
